ExtendedSection.Title: Structure of a content XSD document

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: In OpenCms contents are stored as XML files. Thus, the structure of a content of specific type, but also much of its behavior, is specified in an XML schema definition (XSD). Those XSDs themselves must comply with a special structure. In this topic you'll learn about the general structure of such schemas and learn how to create a new schema in OpenCms.
